
Amazon Elastic Transcoder
*************************


DESCRIPTION
===========

The AWS Elastic Transcoder Service.


Available Commands
==================

* cancel-job

* create-job

* create-pipeline

* create-preset

* delete-pipeline

* delete-preset

* list-jobs-by-pipeline

* list-jobs-by-status

* list-pipelines

* list-presets

* read-job

* read-pipeline

* read-preset

* test-role

* update-pipeline-notifications

* update-pipeline-status
